info.instruction: You are a student writing an essay on a given topic. Write around 300 words.

prompt.user: You are a student writing an essay on a given topic. Write around 300 words.
prompt.system: Write an essay with the following information: competition can effectively promote the development of economy . however, when we discuss about the issue of competition or cooperation, what we are concerned about is not the whole society . through cooperation, children can learn about interpersonal skills which are significant in the future life of all students .
